      • getTokenEndpoint

        public String getTokenEndpoint()
        Getter method for token endpoint configuration element. Url pointing the server responsible of user authentication. According to Salesforce it should be https://login.salesforce.com/services/oauth2/token, or, if implementing for a community, https://acme.force.com/customers/services/oauth2/token (where acme.force.com/customers is your community URL).
        Returns:
        url of login server

      • setTokenEndpoint

        public void setTokenEndpoint(String tokenEndpoint)
        Setter method for token endpoint configuration element. Url pointing the server responsible of user authentication. According to Salesforce it should be https://login.salesforce.com/services/oauth2/token, or, if implementing for a community, https://acme.force.com/customers/services/oauth2/token (where acme.force.com/customers is your community URL).
        Parameters:
        tokenEndpoint - - url of login server
